getRequestsRecovery

public boolean getRequestsRecovery()
If job should be re-executed if a 'recovery' or 'fail-over' situation is encountered returns true.
Returns:
true if this job requests recovery

getStartDelay

public long getStartDelay()
Get start delay before first execution after starting scheduler.
Returns:
delay between job's registering and first execution in milliseconds

public long getTimeout()
Get job timeout between executions.
Returns:
timeout between job executions (repeat interval) in milliseconds

public java.util.Map getTriggers()

isConcurrent

public boolean isConcurrent()
If jobs can be executed concurrently returns true.
Returns:
true if several instances of this job can run concurrently

isCronExpressionConfigured

public boolean isCronExpressionConfigured()
If cronExpression property is set returns true.
Returns:
true, if cron expression is configured for this job, false overwise

isSessionRequired

public boolean isSessionRequired()
If job requires Hibernate Session bounded to thread returns true.
Returns:
true if this job require a Hibernate Session bounded to thread
